Reference to logger instance
Boolean indicating whether serialization was aborted

parameterdescription.para: Boolean indicating whether serialization was aborted

briefdescription.para: Request a cursor override with the specified shape.

detaileddescription.para: If the cursor shape cursorShape is already registered, its reference count is incremented, but the actual cursor shape does not change. If it is not registered, the current cursor shape is changed to cursorShape, and the override is registered. If the cursor is overridden with a different shape, the previous override is restored before applying the new one.

simplesect.para: The number of active overrides for cursorShape after this call.

briefdescription.para: Remove a previously requested cursor override.

detaileddescription.para: If the cursor shape cursorShape is registered, its reference count is decremented. If the count reaches zero, the override is removed and the previous cursor override (if any) or the default cursor is restored.

parameterdescription.para: If true, removes all overrides for cursorShape regardless of the current count.

simplesect.para: The number of remaining overrides for cursorShape after this call.
The configuration file name
